name: Jurassic Carnival: Coin Party
description:
The BEST Dinosaur Collection machine in the wild!

Collect dinosaurs, complete sets, and win prizes, Are you ready to venture into the wild for an amazing 3D jurassic dozer experience? Can you collect the T-Rex set? Coin Party is here with a new fun-filled jungle story for all you coin pusher addicts! With an exciting family adventure waiting for you, Jurassic Carnival puts hours of fun into your hands.

Jurassic Carnival features:

- Dozens of rare ancient dinosaur prizes to collect!
- Monthly live events and special characters!
- Top-notch 3D graphics for a lively Jungle story experience
- Special quests where everything you collect helps unlock upgrades
- Superb physics, special effects and animations that light up your screen
- Magic chips with unique pusher powers that can be upgraded
- Party Slots: Our slot machine mini-game to win tons of prizes
- Spin the Fortune Wheel to win special rewards
- Compete on leaderboards and unlock achievements
- Look out for awesome new updates!

Become the ultimate hunter & conquer the jungle in this amazing new coin quest! Carve your own story full of rewards and challenges, and be a part of the best coin pusher game around!

For support please contact coinparty@mindstormstudios.com

Visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/coinparty and join our active community of players!
